original_title: Igal: Traditional Dance of the Sama of Tawi-Tawi
overview: The documentary features two notable practitioners of the Sama traditional dance or 'Igal' -- Hadja Sakinur-Ain Delasas from Simunul Island and Nursida Diamson Jaludin from Sibutu Island. They recount their own experiences of learning the dance, explain what the dance is all about, and shares their thoughts on the art form and Sama culture.
title: Igal: Traditional Dance of the Sama of Tawi-Tawi
